channel.title: || Decox reloaded! || 24/7 || vps || new home || working castle wars ||
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=4]DecoX Runescape Private Server![/SIZE][/U][/B]
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.decox.cu.cc"][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dv7a08.png[/img][/URL] DecoX reloaded is a 317 PI server We have huge plans for this server. You are looking at what will be one of the best servers that you've ever seen. We plan on making this server a hell of a lot of fun, and if you come and join us you can get an early start on what will be one of the best.
Currently, we have a two server developers, and a forums developer. Server is 24/7 online!
Join Decox reloaded today, and get a head start! Webclient:[URL=http://"http://www.decox.x10.bz/webclient.html"]Decox webclient[/URL] Client download:[URL=http://"www.decox.x10.bz/decox.jar"]Decox desktop client[/URL] Forums:[URL=http://"www.decox.cu.cc"]Decox website[/URL]
[U][SIZE=6]Features:[/SIZE][/U]
[/CENTER] [B]All skills works [*]Nex and alot of bosses [*]Minigames [*]99% Castle Wars!!! [*]PKmaster [*]Fully curse [*]Quick prayer sellect [*]Hybrid swich (perfect for pking) [*]Trivia Bot.[/B]
- Combat
[*] PvP [*] PvM [*] MvM [*] X-Logging Properly [*] Perfect max hit formulas [*] Perfect accuracy formula [*] Perfect switching between equipment [*] Every weapon special attack [*] Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) [*] Equipment requirements
- Magic
[*] Every modern combat spell [*] Every ancient combat spell [*] Can't mage through walls [*] Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working [*] Weakening spells [*] Teleblock/binding/freezing [*] Alching/Superheat
- Ranged
[*] Bows/arrows [*] Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes) [*] Crossbows (the regular one and karil's) [*] Can't shoot through walls [*] Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
- Prayer
[*] All bones bury-able [*] Every prayer working properly [*] Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
Pictures:
[*][SIZE=4]Home area:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/f84cn.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Shops area:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2zj04gj.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Thieving:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2yo78jk.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Mileston capes:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/23usisp.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Vote points shop:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1128j1c.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Decox points shop:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/blq47.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Skilling teleport:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/jsk741.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]City teleport:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2cwjw2u.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Quick prayer select:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/21a076p.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Nex:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/alit54.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]PK master:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qjhste.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Castle wars ticket exchange:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vb3i9e.png[/img]
[*][SIZE=4]Castle wars:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/4u9op5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/oo280.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nc11j6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/kbvkph.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/35k4ebm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2lo3cxz.png[/img]
Videos:
http://youtu.be/xvEjXDGgeIk [URL=http://"http://youtu.be/WCAElEOdZIw"]Trivia bot[/URL] [URL=http://"http://youtu.be/8LIoiwQDIDQ"]PKmaster[/URL] [/CENTER]

item.title: || Decox reloaded! || 24/7 || vps || new home || working castle wars ||
item.dc:creator: @madrid382 madrid382
item.description:
@madrid382 wrote:

Good Job Bro
Join Now Decox

Welcome To DecoX.

DecoX is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.

Start playing now

There are two ways to play DecoX, through our Webclient or through our downloadable client. The webclient is great if you’re just starting out, however, the downloadable client is great for regular players as you can access it from your desktop!

Still not convinced?

Our server features a vibrant, helpful community with plenty of players on the server, friendly people, perfect combat, following and protection against cheaters and dupers. We also have some features that set us apart from the real RuneScape game, including: Decox-Wars, our custom minigame, some custom items and weapons and different areas!

I Hope You Enjoy Playing Decox Rsps. Thnx

Read full topic
item.source: || Decox reloaded! || 24/7 || vps || new home || working castle wars ||

item.dc:creator: @basil95 basil95
item.description:
@basil95 wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=4]DecoX Runescape Private Server![/SIZE]

[CENTER]
DecoX reloaded is a 317 PI server
We have huge plans for this server. You are looking at what will be one of the best servers that you’ve ever seen. We plan on making this server a hell of a lot of fun, and if you come and join us you can get an early start on what will be one of the best.

Currently, we have a two server developers, and a forums developer.
Server is 24/7 online!

Join Decox reloaded today, and get a head start!
Webclient:Decox webclient
Client download:Decox desktop client
Forums:Decox website

[SIZE=6]Features:[/SIZE]

[/CENTER]
All skills works
[]Nex and alot of bosses
[]Minigames
[]99% Castle Wars!!!
[]PKmaster
[]Fully curse
[]Quick prayer sellect
[]Hybrid swich (perfect for pking)
[]Trivia Bot.

  • Combat

    [] PvP
    [    ] PvM
    [] MvM
    [    ] X-Logging Properly
    [] Perfect max hit formulas
    [    ] Perfect accuracy formula
    [] Perfect switching between equipment
    [    ] Every weapon special attack
    [] Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
    [    ] Equipment requirements

  • Magic

    [] Every modern combat spell
    [    ] Every ancient combat spell
    [] Can’t mage through walls
    [    ] Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working
    [] Weakening spells
    [    ] Teleblock/binding/freezing
    [*] Alching/Superheat

  • Ranged

    [] Bows/arrows
    [    ] Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)
    [] Crossbows (the regular one and karil’s)
    [    ] Can’t shoot through walls
    [*] Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)

  • Prayer

    [] All bones bury-able
    [    ] Every prayer working properly
    [*] Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
